    NUM_SPECIES,

#if TAG_MAJOR_VERSION > 34
    // It would be nice if these could be auto-generated
    SP_FIRST_NONBASE_DRACONIAN = SP_BLACK_DRACONIAN,
    SP_LAST_NONBASE_DRACONIAN = SP_YELLOW_DRACONIAN,
#endif

    SP_UNKNOWN  = 100,
    SP_RANDOM   = 101,
    SP_VIABLE   = 102,
};
COMPILE_CHECK(NUM_SPECIES < SP_UNKNOWN);
